title: The Head and the Heart revisit that place where everything felt magical and easy
description: With some time back in the studio, and working on better ways to communicate, the band release their latest album, Every Shade of Blue.
itunes:title: The Head and the Heart revisit that place where everything felt magical and easy
itunes:author: Raina Douris
itunes:summary: With some time back in the studio, and working on better ways to communicate, the band release their latest album, Every Shade of Blue.
